color_description.name: desert
color_description.cd_en: Light beige. Optimal to mix dark eyebrow colors lighter. Set highlights or lighten up too dark eyebrow pigmentations.

color_description.name: sand
color_description.cd_en: Bright blond. For light to medium blonde hair. To lighten up dark eyebrows and to set highlights.

color_description.name: sahara
color_description.cd_en: Cool dark blonde. For medium to dark blond hair.

color_description.name: ocher
color_description.cd_en: Warm light brown. To make slightly cool eyebrow pigmentation warmer.

color_description.name: clay
color_description.cd_en: Neutral dark blonde. For dark blond to light brown hair.

color_description.name: peat
color_description.cd_en: Neutral light brown. For light to medium brown hair.

color_description.name: siena
color_description.cd_en: Warm medium brown. For auburn hair.

color_description.name: sepia
color_description.cd_en: Dark brown. For medium to dark brown hair.

color_description.name: mud
color_description.cd_en: Dark brown. For medium brown to black hair.

color_description.name: umbra
color_description.cd_en: Neutral dark brown. For dark brown to black hair.

color_description.name: lava
color_description.cd_en: Very dark brown. Also suitable as eyeliner for lighter skin types

color_description.name: soil
color_description.cd_en: Brown black. Also suitable as eyeliner

color_description.name: orange
color_description.cd_en: Brown orange. To correct gray eyebrow pigmentation

color_description.name: khaki
color_description.cd_en: Muted light green. For correcting pink to red eyebrow pigmentation. For light to dark blond hair

color_description.name: olive
color_description.cd_en: Muted dark green. For correcting red eyebrow pigmentation. For brown to dark brown hair

color_description.name: yellow
color_description.cd_en: Mustard yellow. For correction of purple eyebrow pigmentation

color_description.name: black beauty
color_description.cd_en: Blueish black. Not suitable for eyebrows or lips!

color_description.name: deep black
color_description.cd_en: Deep black. Not suitable for eyebrows or lips!

color_description.name: sapphire
color_description.cd_en: Intense blue. To set eyeliner accents.

color_description.name: graphite
color_description.cd_en: Medium gray. Ideal for eye shading.

color_description.name: golden desert
color_description.cd_en: Light beige. Optimal to mix dark eyebrow colors lighter. Set highlights or lighten up too dark eyebrow pigmentations.

color_description.name: peanut butter
color_description.cd_en: Warm beige. Optimal to mix dark eyebrow colors lighter. Set highlights or lighten up too dark eyebrow pigmentations.

color_description.name: toffee
color_description.cd_en: Pale ashy blond. For shading, mixing or to set highlight hairs on dark pigmentations.

color_description.name: ice coffee
color_description.cd_en: Medium dark ash brown. For shading and correction of pink to reddish faded eyebrow pigmentation.

color_description.name: coconut
color_description.cd_en: Pale reddish brown. For shading. Very suitable for red-blond types.

color_description.name: hazelnut
color_description.cd_en: Medium dark brown. For shading and hairstrokes.

color_description.name: velvet brown
color_description.cd_en: Medium dark reddish brown. For shading and hairstrokes. Very suitable for maroon eyebrows.

color_description.name: mahagony
color_description.cd_en: Warm dark brown. For shading and hairstrokes. Very suitable for auburn eyebrows.

color_description.name: dark chocolate
color_description.cd_en: Cool dark brown. For shading and hairstrokes.

color_description.name: olive tree
color_description.cd_en: Cool dark brown. For shading and hairstrokes. Can also be used as eyeliner.

color_description.name: espresso
color_description.cd_en: Black Brown. Only suitable for hairstrokes on dark skin types! For light skin types also suitable as eyeliner.

color_description.name: wood treasure
color_description.cd_en: Medium gray. Ideal for eye shading.

color_description.name: noisette
color_description.cd_en: Warm dark blond. For shading

color_description.name: chestnut
color_description.cd_en: Warm medium brown. For shading and hairstrokes.

color_description.name: persian horse
color_description.cd_en: Neutral dark brown. For shading and hairstrokes.

color_description.name: amazon
color_description.cd_en: Very dark brown. For shading and hairstrokes.

color_description.name: marsala
color_description.cd_en: Warm light brown. For shading

color_description.name: geisha
color_description.cd_en: Black brown. For shading and hairstrokes. Only suitable for dark skin types. Also suitable as eyeliner (even with fair skin types)

color_description.name: papaya
color_description.cd_en: Bright orange. To mix colors lighter and warmer. For correction and lightening of dark lips and lip pigmentation (purple to blue).

color_description.name: pomegranate
color_description.cd_en: Coral Nudeton. For lightening dark lips and lip pigmentation and to mix colors lighter.

color_description.name: nougat
color_description.cd_en: Nude beige. To make bright colors softer and natural.

color_description.name: peach
color_description.cd_en: Bright rosewood. For lightening dark lips and lip pigmentation and to mix colors lighter.

color_description.name: tasty nude
color_description.cd_en: Dark rosewood.

color_description.name: antic rose
color_description.cd_en: Rosé. To lighten dark lips (Arabic to Asian).

color_description.name: cherry blossom
color_description.cd_en: Natural pink lip color. For "invisible" contours and faded lips.

color_description.name: le rouge
color_description.cd_en: Bright brilliant red. For fresh lips and for mixing.

color_description.name: cranberry
color_description.cd_en: Intense red. For refreshing tired lip colors and pigmentations. All time Classic!

color_description.name: merlot
color_description.cd_en: Darkest red. For expressive lips. Pay attention to not too intensive color input (tendency to purple)!

color_description.name: sweet plum
color_description.cd_en: Dark red. For expressive lips. Pay attention to not too intensive color input (tendency to purple)!

color_description.name: fuchsia
color_description.cd_en: Muted dark pink. To give lips with strong lip red more expression.

color_description.name: dragon fruit
color_description.cd_en: Intense pink. Gives a fresh look.

color_description.name: flamingo
color_description.cd_en: Brilliant pink. Gives a fresh look.

color_description.name: romantique
color_description.cd_en: Light Pink. Gives a fresh look.

color_description.name: brick red
color_description.cd_en: Muted red-brown. For expressional lip contours.

color_description.name: berry kiss
color_description.cd_en: Muted rosé. To intensify natural lip red. Versatile.
